creator: pkrupets@yahoo.com
text:
Hello,

Attached you can find patch for removing StackOverflowException. It's impossible
to run JProfiler if this exception is thrown.

I am not sure whether it's a good idea to use sets to record history or it's
better to use 'Floyd's cycle-finding algorithm' (requires some modification).

With regards,
Pavel Krupets

Created attachment 20879
patch for StackOverflowException in formula evaluator
creator: pkrupets@yahoo.com
pkrupets@yahoo.com
text: ignore this patch for a while

creator: apache@gagravarr.org
text: Please feel free to re-open this bug if you figure out a working patch
